titleStmt.title: Several informations and examinations taken concerning Lieutenant Colonell John Lilburn shewing his apostacy to the party of Charles Stewart, and what his intentions are in coming over into England out of Flanders.
titleStmt.author: Berkenhead, Isaac.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills, and for G. Calvert and T. Brewster,

notesStmt.note: Includes sections signed by Isaac Berkenhead and others.
Imperfect: stained with loss of print.
